name: A Night in a Jail Cell
name_original: A Night in a Jail Cell
description:
Content Warning: Swearing, Allusions to violence and drug use.

A Night in a Jail Cell is a tiny prison drama. It's my first attempt at publicly releasing a game, so please be kind.

This story will not be for all tastes but it is nevertheless about real people, with real stories in a real place and moment in time.

Use W, A, S, D or arrows to move. Bump into people and things to find out more about them.
